body_html: hi @soff22, I believe it should work if you enter an integer only (eg. 20), I've just tried it out locally – however you are right, there is no error message implying that this field should be integer-only. Maybe we can quickly try to fix that! Thank you for pointing it out.

body: hi @soff22, I believe it should work if you enter an integer only (eg. 20), I've just tried it out locally – however you are right, there is no error message implying that this field should be integer-only. Maybe we can quickly try to fix that! Thank you for pointing it out.
